formatDescription: XAR (eXtensible Archive format) is an open source file archiver introduced in Mac OS X 10.5.
provenanceCompoundName: Artefactual Systems Inc / Artefactual Systems Inc

internalSignatures.name: eXtensible ARchive format
internalSignatures.note: BOF: xar!..    Magic num (4 bytes), header length (2 bytes, value 001C). Next two bytes are version number - currently 0001 so possibility to extend signature, particularly if subsequent versions developed.
